title: buying your worst shaped Hal Chase cards
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: buying your worst shaped Hal Chase cards
posts.post_content:
If you got some funky Hal Chase cards I got a home for them. Buying anything up to a grade 1 (and maybe 2 if the price is right). Love "authentics" raw whatever. I LOVE THEM ALL. My son has become fascinated with Hal Chase and am working on a beater collection for him. Thanks for your help!
sean :)
let me know if you are interested

Hi Andrew!
whats the back and how much?
thanks!
